text: Chillán is a city and commune of the central south of Chile. It has a population of 161.953 people (2002 census). the city was founded in 1580 as San Bartolomé de Chillán. It is the capital of the Ñuble Region. == References == == Other websites == * Chillán's official website Category:Cities in Chile Category:Ñuble Region
title: Chillán
